Name: El Desafio de Jonata
Wine Description: An evocative nose defined by true cassis and gorgeous dark green notes of licorice, dried herbs and nori. Muscular, dense and structured; everything cab should be. Manages to also be restrained with black fruit intertwined with dusty herbal notes. More darkness, more power, more complexity. Picks up momentum on the palate. Remains refined and somewhat reserved today. Stands in line with the legendary 2009 Desafio. Dark and brooding; another stunning defiance.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Winery: Tenuta Santa Maria di Gaetano Bertani
Wine Description: The Amarone della Valpolicella Docg Classico Riserva, a prestigious wine of unique character which gives full expression to the Veronese winemaking tradition; Amarone is produced using the finest grapes cultivated in these very hills, the hills of the Valpolicella, picked by hand and dried in crates four to five months prior to successive phases of production: crushing, fermentation (25-30 days) at a controlled temperature, maceration, storage in oak barrels for 48 months and a further refinement period of at least six.

Name: Artistry Red Wine
Wine Description: It has essence of vanilla bean, perfumed herbs, raspberrry and blackberry traits with a touch of toasted nuts. On the palate the black fruit comes forward with layered black currant and blackberry. French Oak lends mocha and vanilla accented spice and toasted sweetness. The tannins are very well developed and should integrate as the wine decants or is allowed cellar time.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: A soft, immediately approachable classic Saint-Emilion. Raspberries, strawberries, plums, balanced with gentle acidity and rounded off with sweet fine-grained oak. A perfect wine to drink with a special dinner.

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Pajé
Wine Description: Complex wines with bright, intense fruit and lively acidity, nice tannic finish.

Name: Père de Famille
Wine Description: The blackcurrant, plum and black cherry perfumes of fully developed Cabernet are enhanced by floral notes, dried thyme, anise and vanilla oak aromas. A sturdy wine, tenacious and promising of long cellar potential, it opens with creamy integration to an elegant, long finish.

Name: Vie Erte Barbaresco
Wine Description: Rich and intense aromas of ripe plum, mushroom and milk chocolate. Full-bodied, with soft and silky tannins and a delicate, pretty, fruity finish.

Name: Bourgogne Rouge
Winery: Domaine A. et P. de Villaine

Name: Riserva Chianti Classico
Wine Description: The Castell’in Villa Chianti Classico Riserva is concentrated well tannined and with an elegant fragrance for the eye and nose. The taste is complex, showing ripe fruit, black cherries and some deep earthy spicy tones.

Name: Beaune Vieilles Vignes
Wine Description: It has Beautiful shiny dark ruby ​​color. discreet nose after aeration reveals aromatic notes between blackcurrant bud and narcissus. A subtle mouth both fine and concentrated. An atypical Beaune, concentrated and fluid.

Name: Providence Dry Red
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Gabriel
Wine Description: It presents an intense red hue, with limpidez.A good brilliance and complexity of mature red fruit aromas. Reflects in Thintensity Also Contributed Such a vanilla flavor, chocolate toffee and black in the barrel. Thintensidad also it reflected in the aromas provided by the barrel as vanilla, toffee, black chocolate and some very presents tabaco.Taninos aroma, very balanced with good acidity structure

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The nose has a deep, profound, cherry perfume with a hint of the dried pine needle/forest floor aroma. The mouth echoes the nose and the lively acidity keeps the concentration on the palate fresh and not heavy.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Boisrenard
Wine Description: It has character and states in its fruit (strawberries, blueberries, old boy jam) with a Relay spicy, mineral salt and look great distinction afforded to him unusual.

Name: Dry Creek Valley Old Vine Reserve Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of chocolate, oak and dark berry fruit. The full body, dark blackberry jam is balanced with a touch of spice that bursts onto the palate. A long gentle spice finish will have you wanting to take another sip

Name: Sarah Jane's Block Reserve Pinot Noir
Santa Cruz Mountains Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Medium reddish-purple color in the glass. Outgoing aromas of dark berries, spice, redwood and campfire. Deliciously rich and intensely flavored core of black cherry, dark berry and blueberry fruits, exotically spiced with a hint of lemongrass. Very soft and easy to drink now. Less refined the following day from a previously opened and re-corked bottle, showing more oak. This is a solid daily drinker for current consumption. Good.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Lifted red fruit, violet and spicy blackcurrant aromatics. Followed by a suave, textural palate showing lots of density, complexity and persistence.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: 70% Merlot for the roundness that it bestows, 20% Cabernet franc for elegance, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon for the structure. Purple robe of Castelot, the aromes as long as a regal procession, a royal guard of mild spices, vanilla, ripe fruit and new leather, devilishly harmonious and lively on the palate, with rounded tannins and a wonderfully lingering finish... a wine fit for a King !

Name: The Grace of The Land Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Barolo
Wine Description: Ruby red, tending to garnet red with ageing.Complex, combining freshness with elegance and finesse.Strong presence of tannins with great balance and persistence.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Bright plum and pomegranate aromas ready the palate for this elegant and unique wine. Smooth, silky fruit with supple tannins and soft herbal notes finish with a smooth, lingering finish. Presents beautifully now and will only improve with age.

Name: Bue Apis
Wine Description: Purple colour. The aroma is reminiscent of blackberries and blackcurrants. Full flavour and balanced tannins and a long finish with hints of roasted coffee, tobacco and spices.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Silencieux
Wine Description: It is full bodied and powerful, opening with aromatic anise, scents of sweet cassis, blackberries and smoky coffee that lead to a concentrated and lengthy finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has bright red cherry lollipop,tootsie roll, lilac, violet, and deep blackberry jam. The palate stays true to the olfactory impression, with additions of Black Forest cake, bruleed mocha custard, and light clovey spice.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Its color is intense ruby and the aromas are of mature fruits, sustained in the palate by great complexity. The tannins are noteworthy, silky and oily, persistent.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: Intense in colour, with red fruit aroma, the meaty palate is carried by the silky softness of the tannins to give a wine of sumptuous elegance.

Name: Barbaresco Tre Stelle
Wine Description: Bright garnet red with orange highlights. Elegant notes of roses, violet, leather, wild red berries, a fresh vein of minerality, slightly spiced. Great finesse tannins structure, very classic

Name: The Coppermine Road Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has a deep, dark, vibrant black appearance suggesting a full-bodied dry red. The aroma is dense and complex with a mix of fragrant fruit dominated by cassis, blackcurrants, mulberries, coffee, toffee and dark chocolate with fine cedar oak developing in the background. The palate shows a lighter, fresher, more elegant style of wine compared to recent vintages but is overwhelmingly complex and compressed. Young primary flavours of dark black fruits, violets, cassis and red currants mixed with edges of dried herbs, green bean and capsicum dominate. As the wine opens up an abundant mix of violets, earthy notes and mulberries appear over dark fruits with really tight flowery tannins and minerals that fan out on the finish. The great fruit, length and fragrance of this wine show the overall elegance of this wonderful vintage.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: A deep red colour. The nose has toasty oak, with ripe but crunchy black fruits, especially black cherries, and minerals. The palate at first seems to be lacking in body, a touch thin and dominated by tannins.

Name: Ségla Margaux
Wine Description: Violets, blackberry, cherry and cedar can be found in the nose and taste of the younger wines. As the wine ages, cassis and spicy overtones appear.

Name: Brothers Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has mineral, savory length. Our entire family has worked so hard, and with the utmost integrity, to produce this wine.

Name: Revelation Proprietary Red
Winery: The Winery At Holy Cross Abbey
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Vegetarian, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ruby red in color. On the nose, there are complex and ripe fruit notes. There is a good presence of tannins.

Name: Barolo Bussia Corsini
Wine Description: Medium deep ruby red, with garnet to orange overtones. An exhilarating rush of freshness on the nose, followed immediately warming broader elements which can include candied cherries, bitter cherries, plums, strawberries and raspberries.

Name: BroDeux Red
Wine Description: Brings tremendous power and fruit yet showcases mutated levels of Bordelaise herbal characteristics. On the nose is primarily classic Cabernet red and black fruit and Brett inflected herbal depth. On the palate notes of cassis and black cherry jam and tobacco emerge.
